text.text_translated:
Much business happens today across international borders. Most people in world business use English. It is a common language. But there are small, important differences in business talking. People also expect different things. This changes from one culture to another.

If you don't know a culture's ways and practices, problems can happen. You might think badly about people. You might misunderstand them. This can stop business talking.

Here are three main differences. They are about business good manners in the world. These can help you do well. They help when you work with people from other cultures.

feedback.feedback: The response successfully adhered to the JSON schema, including the nested 'output' object and string types for all properties.
